column5: 1 Bedroom 1 bathroom entire apartment in Irving. One full size bed, one huge sectional sofa, dinning table, studying desk, TV, washer & dryer, and kitchen. Secured community with fitness room, and three swimming pools. Walking distance to North Lake college. Also lots of restaurants and Grocery stores are nearby.  Very convenient location closed to 114/183 & PGBT, 10 mins drive to DFW airport and 10mins drive to Irving downtown/ Las Colinas. About 25mins to Dallas downtown.
column8: Comfy & Clean Apartment in Irving/Las Colinas
